Description.Text:
Property Location
A stay at Berida Manor Country Resort Bowral places you in the heart of Bowral, steps from Bowral Golf Course and close to International Cricket Hall of Fame. This 4-star guesthouse is within close proximity of Corbett Gardens and Mount Jellore Lookout.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 40 guestrooms featuring refrigerators and DVD players. 81-cm flat-screen televisions with digital programming provide entertainment, while wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected. Private bathrooms have complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as desks and coffee/tea makers.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy a range of recreational amenities, including an indoor pool, a spa tub, and a sauna. Additional features at this Art Deco guesthouse include wireless Internet access (surcharge), a fireplace in the lobby, and a television in the lobby.

Dining
Enjoy a satisfying meal at a restaurant serving guests of Berida Manor Country Resort Bowral. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Event facilities at this guesthouse consist of a conference center, conference space, and meeting rooms. Free self parking is available onsite.
